      • searchList3k

        public void searchList3k()
        Search button is clicked 1. check if inputs are valid 2. if variety name or iris id are set, show passport and phenotype else query using values for country and subpopulation 3. display result in table 4. if result is more than 2, generate phylogenetic tree
